passage_text: 1327 W Temperance Rd This Single-Family Home located at 1327 West Temperance Road, Temperance MI sold for $50,000on Apr 29, 2015. The property has a lot size of 1.04 acres. The average listing price for similar homes for sale is $166,307 and the average sales price for similar recently sold homes is $159,250. This property is in the 48182 ZIP code in Temperance, MI.

Zip Code 48182 Public Schools. 48182 is located in the state of Michigan in the Detroit metro area. Zip code 48182 is primarily located in Monroe County. The official postal service name used for 48182 is TEMPERANCE, Michigan. Portions of the 48182 zip code are contained within or border the city limits of Temperance, MI, Lambertville, MI, and Toledo, OH. The 48182 area code is 734. 48182 can be classified socioeconically as a Middle Class class zipcode in comparison to other zipcodes in Michigan.

The Temperance ZIP code, 48182, serves most of Bedford Township outside of the Lambertville area, as well as portions of western Erie Township, southern Ida Township, and northeast Whiteford Township. Temperance was established as Bedford Center in 1859.
